BRIH.NAME: Grant Management System (GMS)
BRIH.INFO:
Base version of MGMS is available online
N-level project and fund allocations; details of grant period, fund allocation, and allows online submission of utilization certificate.
Any institute may register for these services. Base version of MGMS is available online

Any institute may register for these services.
